title: Robbydreams
author: Robbydreams
content: I'm into web3 gaming and the project called NeonLink is about to release 3 this yearNeonPunks, Ascend The End, NeonSaga if you're interested in those games I'll tell you more about them later Also there will be a public token sale soon, MainNet and more cool stuffTestNet called operation "Break_Me" is so much fun, Neon bots are super cute characters, while Neon Punks (upcoming NFTs) are cool ! Their new website is dope looking, the design, the idea are wholesome So I wanna know what you think about web3 gaming and NeonLink? In my opinion for those who are into web3 gaming might be a good pick, lets talk about it and thanks everyone Let this alt coin season be good!

comments.author: BatonNakroshil
